description: Do not make up any values or you'll get a wrong value; use this action instead to get the correct value of a missing parameter in a word problem.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: A detailed description (2-3 sentences) of the missing value; provide all the context the user provided to get the best results.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: The units used to measure the value (e.g., 'meters', 'seconds', 'dollars', etc.). (required)
